name: Eyemutant Sinew Armor

items.alias: B.B.I. - Nano Enhanced B-12 Tanning Acid
Small Patch of Soft Bronto Hide
Patch of Soft Bronto Hide - Tanned

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Short" "204767", #L "Long" "204769" or #L "Eyemutant Sinews" "204768" #L "B.B.I. - Nano Enhanced B-12 Tanning Acid" "162247" #L "XXX-Plumbo Beer Can" "130607" #L "Small patch of soft bronto hide" "162234", #L "Patch of soft bronto hide" "162230" or #L "Patch of hard bronto hide" "162228" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Example: making of a sleeve B.B.I. - Nano Enhanced B-12 Tanning Acid + Patch of soft bronto hide = #L "Patch of Soft Bronto Hide - Tanned" "162242" Skills: | CH,AG | ------------------------------ XXX-Plumbo Beer Can + Long Eyemutant Sinews = #L "Long Eyemutant Sinews - Preserved" "204772" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Long Eyemutant Sinews - Preserved + Patch of Hard Bronto Hide - Tanned = #L "Eyemutant Sinew Sleeves - 1 Bundle" "204791" Skills: | CH | You can apply 11 other "Long Eyemutant Sinews - Preserved" on the piece of armor you made to increase its QL. ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ #L "Patch of Soft Bronto Hide" "162230", #L "Long Eyemutant Sinews" "204769" -> Eyemutant Sinew Sleeves ( ie : #L "Eyemutant Sinew Sleeves - 12 Bundles" "204802" ) #L "Patch of Hard Bronto Hide" "162228", #L "Eyemutant Sinews" "204768" -> Eyemutant Sinew Boots ( ie : #L "Eyemutant Sinew Boots - 12 Bundles" "204814" ) #L "Small Patch of Soft Bronto Hide" "162234", #L "Short Eyemutant Sinews" "204767" -> Eyemutant Sinew Gloves ( ie : #L "Eyemutant Sinew Gloves - 12 Bundles" "204826" ) ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Enforcer only. Interesting Cold and Fire damage bonuses !
